name: Last-Minute Sort-of Spanish Shrimp
recipeYield: 2 servings, or more with pasta or bread
keywords: cumin, garlic, shrimp, dairy-free, main course
recipeIngredient: Three-quarters to one pound shrimp, peeled or not
Chopped parsley and lemon wedges for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Put the olive oil in a skillet just big enough to hold the shrimp in one layer and turn the heat to low. Add the garlic and adjust the heat so that it barely sizzles; when it colors nicely, add the saffron, chipotle and cumin, and stir for a minute or so. (All of the seasonings can be adjusted to taste.)
Add the shrimp and season well. Raise the heat a bit and cook, turning once or twice, until firm, 5 minutes or less depending on their size. Garnish and serve.

video.name: Shrimp With Smoked Paprika
video.description: Mark Bittman demonstrates how to make a simple shrimp dish out of ingredients found in the pantry.
